text: the following report contains some
disturbing images
shot from a dashboard camera a police
car trails a man who's robbed a store
and is threatening to kill himself as
the standoff continues a rifle is fired
in the air and this now the view from a
second police car the suspect survived
the impact the police driver who ran
into him was cleared of any wrongdoing
police in Arizona released this video
footage to show the use of force was
justified when he comes around the
corner
he knows several things you know the
guy's not obeying commands the guy has a
high-powered rifle the guy has already
cranked off one round and the guy is now
very near to a heavily populated
business businesses and I can't let him
get into one of those businesses across
America the police are being criticized
for using too much force in this case
they say they acted swiftly and
decisively to protect the public Andy
Moore BBC news
